messages.title: A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.
3 great reasons to vote for Stan Heptinstall
messages.content:
1. A local man with a track record of service to Broxtowe - not a career politician
2. A vote for Stan is a vote to keep Broxtowe as a strong and independent borough
3. A vote for Stan is a vote for a stronger economy AND a fairer society.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly. Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
Guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn a year.
Protect education spending from cradle to college.

issues.economy: Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly.
issues.education: Protect education spending from cradle to college.
issues.health: Guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn a year.

leaflet.personalStatement: A local man with a track record of service to Broxtowe - not a career politician.

images.caption: Stan Heptinstall, Liberal Democrat candidate for Broxtowe
